group_1.textRight: ...It seems like we've worked out everything we@need.

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm...

group_1.textRight: What's the matter, Touka? Something on your@mind?

group_1.textLeft: You know how we're going on a trip together,@right?
To my family's private beach.
I'm trying to come up with a program for that.

group_1.textRight: Program?
Ahh, you mean planning the trip.
Are we going to hold some kind of event?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yeah! Since we're finally going on a trip, I want us@to have as much fun as we can!
We need something to keep the fun going so we@won't get bored...maybe some kind of game...
There's so much to think about, and SO much to@look forward to!

group_1.textRight: ...Touka, could it be that you're up to something@devious?

group_1.textLeft: Huuuh? I have no clue what you're talking about.

group_1.textRight: You're definitely plotting something.
...All right, I'll make the plans with you.
I don't care what you do to others, but this would@put me at risk as well.
It's a bit of a hassle, but I'll take care of my share@of the planning.

group_1.textLeft: ...*Giggle*
I knew you'd say that.

group_1.textRight: I suppose that's all.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:100701:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle*! I'm really looking forward to it.

group_1.textRight: ...But, I wonder if this is really okay...

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean?

group_1.textRight: In our program, there's a swimming competition@and sailing, yes?
I agreed to it because it sounds like it will be fun,@but...

group_1.textLeft: It'll be fine!
It's a private beach.
No matter how noisy we are, nobody will get mad@at us.

group_1.textRight: That's not what I'm concerned about...
Touka, we just got out of the hospital, didn't we?
In other words, you have no experience swimming.@Will that really be alright?

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*
Whaaat, is that all?
Do you think I would suggest going to the beach@without considering that?
I have the perfect solution to that!

group_1.textRight: I see, then it's fine in that case.
But I'd like to hear what your solution is, for the@record.
Perhaps you don't intend to participate, but merely@watch from afar as everyone else struggles...
If that's the case, it's rather despicable, but@I would be able to enjoy that as well.

group_1.textLeft: I wouldn't do that!

group_1.textRight: Is that so? That's unexpected. But then,@what could it possibly be...

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle*! Just think about it, Nemu.
We still have plenty of time before the trip, right?

group_1.textRight: That's correctâ€” wait, you couldn't mean...

group_1.textLeft: Before the trip, I'll just train at the gym my family@owns!
I even have my own personal trainer!

group_1.textRight: That's quite a gamble you're taking.

group_1.textLeft: It's not a gamble at all!
By my calculations...
I'll be able to swim like an ordinary person after@10 training sessions!

group_1.textRight: It seems like you're also quite adept at@sports science.

group_1.textLeft: As long as I learn how to float and breathe,@it'll be easy!

group_1.textRight: ...Let's hope your calculations aren't off.
Touka...all this equipment...are you going to play@with this today?
Which means, you couldn't learn how to swim@after all that practice.

group_1.textLeft: Wrong! My calculations weren't off!
It's just that my interests have changed...

group_1.textRight: Interests...?

group_1.textLeft: I did practice swimming properly.
But then, I realized...
Water feels nice, but it's also painful and scary...

group_1.textRight: Well, that's part of the joy of it...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, so that's why...[wait:0.5]
I decided to play with the Amane sisters instead!
[chara:100750:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Giggle*

group_1.textRight: I see.
